name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, in Dongguan, Guangdong, Fenggang Town was exposed for withholding wages for sanitation workers. The workers went on strike, leaving the streets unattended and a large amount of garbage scattered next to the trash cans.
A video showed workers gathering at the Fenggang Town Government to defend their rights. The video poster said that they had not been paid for two months.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, in Shanghai, netizens used cameras to record the Shanghai South Railway Station in the early hours of the morning. Some people slept on the floor outside the railway station to save on accommodation costs.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, two students from the No. 1 Middle School in Huangzhong District, Xining City, Qinghai Province, died of Neisseria meningitidis.
On July 4, the Xining government announced that all teachers and students in the class were suspended from classes, and were not allowed to go out or gather unless necessary.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: July 5, Shandong. A "Ding Yizhen-style window" appeared at the Pingdu Citizen Service Center, requiring residents to kneel or bend over to consult.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On July 3, a segment in the TV series "The Police Chief" in which the household registration window refused to issue temporary residence permits to outsiders and the new chief solved the problem domineeringly was ridiculed by many netizens. Netizens called it a "sci-fi film"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On July 3, the Urban Management Bureau of Chifeng City, Inner Mongolia was cancelled and its assets and debts were taken over by the Urban Operation Center.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: July 5, Dongguan, Guangdong. A woman posted a video saying that her husband worked at Weiqin Motor Hardware Co., Ltd. He died in the dormitory in the early morning of July 2, but the factory did not give the family a specific reply and locked the door to prevent the family from entering the factory. The family knelt outside the door and cried: Who will give us justice? We have been here for three days.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: July 5, Hangzhou, Zhejiang. Many students reported that the China Academy of Art started military training on July 1, during which a number of students had fever and ruptured meniscus cysts. The school not only refused to grant leave, but also required students to continue training in the high temperature and threatened students not to speak out about the incident.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The Shanghai Stock Exchange has put forward specific requirements for securities companies: sing the bright prospects of China's economy and be good at counter-cyclical layout.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, in Guangdong, a netizen posted that he was asked about his age during an interview at Luckin Coffee. After learning that he was 26 years old, the store manager said that it was beyond their budget and that they needed young and energetic people, and they were afraid that there would be a generation gap in the conversation with them.
